p: Interferon has been studied in vitro against coronaviruses, but there is no evidence it will be effective against COVID-19. Pediatricians in China have suggested nebulized interferon be considered in infected children [ 11]; however, they reported there is no data to support itsâ€™ use and publications from Canada advise against routine nebulizer use, noting the potential for spreading of the virus by aerosolization [ 20].
